title: When will g suite users be able to use assistant 2.0
content: I understand that you have to have English as the only language on the device as well as using gesture navigation but so far the only way I'm able to use assistant 2.0 on my device is trying to remove my work email account which is not an option or login as a separate profile what you just not very convenient as I always have to be able to get work emails because I'm on call 24/7 has anyone found a workaround to get assistant 2.0 working on their pixel 4 or 4XL also while I'm here does anyone know if it is possible to load assistant 2.0 on gen 1 Google homes and Google home minis
category: Google Assistant and Voice Actions, Google Pixel 4 XL
